name: Financial Calculator
author: Financial Calculators

sections.description: The Financial Calculator is a comprehensive tool designed to enhance user experience by offering a seamless way to calculate indicative loan repayments. Easily integrated into any webpage or blog post, this plugin is equipped with a user-friendly form and utilizes AJAX for real-time calculations, ensuring immediate feedback without the need for page refreshes. This modern approach is complemented by compatibility with older browsers, where the plugin gracefully degrades and introduces a calculation button for manual repayment computation.
sections.installation:
1. Upload to your plugins folder, usually wp-content/plugins/
  2. Activate the plugin on the plugin screen.
  3. Configure the plugin.

Note: Upgrading from 1.x to 2.x will automatically deactivate the plugin. Head over to your Plugins section and reactivate it.
sections.faq:
How do I add the form to a post or page?

You need to add the [finance_calculator] or the [loan_calculator] shortcode to the body of the post/page.

short_description: The Financial Calculator plugin provides instant loan repayment calculations and features an application form for diverse financial needs.
description: The Financial Calculator is a comprehensive tool designed to enhance user experience by offering a seamless way to calculate indicative loan repayments. Easily integrated into any webpage or blog post, this plugin is equipped with a user-friendly form and utilizes AJAX for real-time calculations, ensuring immediate feedback without the need for page refreshes. This modern approach is complemented by compatibility with older browsers, where the plugin gracefully degrades and introduces a calculation button for manual repayment computation.
